1.title: The Mercedes C63 AMG Experiment

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Mercedes 480bhp C63 AMG coupe, with optional power upgrade, already has more than enough power to trouble its rear tyres. What happens when you remove some of that grip? Good things, that's what.

2.title: GT3 RS 4.0: Last Drive Before Hibernation

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: English winters and Michelin Pilot Sport Cup tyres don't mix, so I'm taking one last drive before putting the car that is rapidly bankrupting me into storage - special storage.

3.title: Group B Worship: Ford RS200 and Audi Sport Quattro

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: To enter Group B in the 1980s, car makers had to build 200 road-going examples of the car they intended to rally. These rules created some of the most spectacular road cars of all time. I love rallying: the chance to drive an RS200 and a Sport Quattro nearly sent me to the nut-house. Fire up the Quattro.

4.title: The Toyota FT-86, GT-86, Scion FRS

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: One of the most anticipated new cars of 2012, the Toyota rear wheel drive entry level sports car with too many names: GT-86, FT-86, and FRS. Also known as the Subaru BRZ. Chris Harris travels to Spain to get the most out of a short session in the car.

5.title: 2012 BMW M5 vs Nissan GT-R: Driven & Drifted

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: Chris Harris reviews the new 2012 BMW M5 and Nissan GT-R, in the rain. Do these two cars belong together? Probably not - but it's perfect for YouTube search results, and thats why we're doing it. Watch as Chris reviews the two cars on the street and on the track.

6.title: Living with the McLaren MP4-12C

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: Five days in one of the most interesting sports cars ever made. The 600hp MP4-12C mixes everyday usability with Millennium Falcon performance. We drive it everywhere from town-centre to race-track. And yes, we now want one rather desperately.

7.title: Ice Driving with the New Audi A1 Quattro

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

7.plot: 252hp in a hatchback designed for city use. It's an extreme car the A1 quattro. Just 333 are being built. We went to Sweden to drive it on a lake. Which told us very little about the car, but it looked beautiful. And we got a ride with Stig Blomqvist in a Sport Quattro. This is a Chris Harris home movie...

8.title: BMW M550d X Drive Road Test

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

8.plot: BMW M550d X Drive road test. It has more torque than the space shuttle and BMW claims it will do over 40mpg. BMW also says it won't be selling the car in the UK or the US, the places that DRIVE is most commonly viewed. But when something has 3 turbos, you've got to go drive it at 155mph: no?

9.title: The 2012 Porsche Boxster S

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

9.plot: Porsche's new 981 Boxster is an all-new design. Bigger, but lighter than before. We went to the launch event in the South of France to see how good it was. And whether a man can now buy the girl's Porsche.

11.title: Mercedes SL Driven: New & Old

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

11.plot: The new SL 500 is the consummate all-rounder with an unrivaled heritage. We trace its roots from the classic W198 300 SL to the Pagoda W113 and the classic R107. Bobby Ewing forever.

12.title: A Very Special Porsche 911

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

12.plot: Recipe to make a Tuthill 911 historic rally car: Take one donor shell, add 3.5 liter motor, extract 365hp. Remove weight to 1000kg, add dog-gearbox. Then have as much fun as you can in a car.

13.title: Fearsome: Noble M600 and Atom V8 at the Nurburgring

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

13.plot: This is first time that the 475hp Ariel Atom V8 and 650hp Noble M600 have been to the Nordschleife. They were scary as s***. Awesome times.

14.title: Lotus Exige S track test: 350hp, chassis from the Gods

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

14.plot: Take the Evora S supercharged V6, change the suspension and go chase the Porsche GT3. This is the best street/track car Lotus has ever built. Let's just hope it isn't too little too late.

15.title: Porsche GT3 RS 4.0 v BMW M3 GTS v Mercedes C63 AMG Black

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

15.plot: You know the form by now: driving on road and track. Carving the neat, fast line. Then pulling massive slides, and telling it how it really is with all three cars. Doubt we'll have more fun in 2012.

16.title: 2012 Mercedes SL63 AMG Bi-Turbo Review: Gentleman, Thug

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

16.plot: First drive in Merc's new 660lb ft sports cruiser. Contains civilized and uncivilized driving.

17.title: Nissan GT-R Track Pack v Porsche 997 Turbo S

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

17.plot: It's been raining in England for the past 6 weeks, so this is a damp test. The GT-R Track Pack seems a bit half-hearted and, on-paper, the 997 Turbo S is the closest rival. I went to an evening track event at Brands hatch to discover the differences/work out if the Track pack is worth the extra cash.

18.title: 1986 BMW M5 E28: The Original Super 4-door

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

18.plot: Driving an M5 - what the hell was it like in 1986?

19.title: G63 AMG: Super Sports Utility

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

19.plot: Just because the world doesn't need a 544hp doesn't mean it shouldn't have one. The G63 is so bad, it's almost good.

20.title: Rally Heaven - Shotgun in a Lancia Stratos and Delta S4

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

20.plot: This might just be the best day of my working life. The nut-job launch event for the Pirelli P7 Corsa Classic was pure, Italian, chaotic genius with Markku Alen and Juha Kankkunen. Watch and smile.

21.title: Cheap Oversteer! The BMW 325i Rally Test Day. A Shambles.

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

21.plot: Bought for £4000, Chris and pals take the 325 for its first gravel test. Many things go wrong.

22.title: New Audi RS4, Old Audi RS4s, New RS4 v C63. Phew

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

22.plot: We drive the new Audi RS4, try the original B5, the amazing B7 and then match the latest version against the 6.2 liter Mercedes C63.

23.title: Worlds Fastest SUV? The Bowler EXR-S.

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

23.plot: Bowler makes the finest customer-spec rally raid machines - its EXR is a stunning competition machine. But now they're making a street version. With 550hp.

24.title: Ford Shelby GT500 v Chevrolet Camaro ZL1: Street & Circuit

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

24.plot: The two muscle-motors of the moment, head-to-head. Hard to imagine a factory warranted Mustang with 670hp, or a State-subsidized 580hp Camaro.

25.title: Pagani Huayra: Test Drive in Italy

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

25.plot: Chris Harris flies to Italy to be one of the first journalists behind the wheel of the new Pagani Huayra. A 24 hour trip to Modena and a proper drive in the 730hp Huayra.

26.title: Porsche GT2 RS v. Ducati 1199 Panigale: The Drag Race.

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

26.plot: Monster bike versus monstrous car. The bike has 192hp, the car 620. The venue was Santa Pod drag strip.

27.title: The BAC Mono: 280hp, 540kg. Wet and Drifty.

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

27.plot: The BAC Mono is a carbon-bodied piece of sculpture with the innards of a Formula 3 car: 540kg, 280hp. The handling is astonishing, in the wet.

28.title: Toyota GT86/Scion FR-S v Nissan 370Z v Used Porsche Cayman S

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

28.plot: We know it works on track, but is 200hp enough on the road? You can get a 370Z for similar money. Or a used Cayman S. If the GT 86 can do the business here, it has to be one of the great cars of 2012.

29.title: Sold the Porsche, Bought a Ferrari 599

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

29.plot: The finance payments were too much, someone offered me good money for it, so I sold the Porsche. 599 values have hit the skids in the UK, Ferrari won't let me drive its cars any more, and I miss driving them so I bought, a 599. It's fast.

30.title: AMG Hammer Sideways in the Rain! (And a Factory Tour)

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

30.plot: It's not every day you get a spin in a factory owned AMG Hammer. We also had a trip around the factory at Affalterbach and saw some other cool stuff.

31.title: Is the Mazda MX-5 Any Good?

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

31.plot: Chris Harris has been known to not like the Mazda MX-5, even calling it dirty words in an article a few years back. Now he gets to support his point by swapping his Ferrari 599 with Cameraman and Editor Neil Carey's NA Mazda MX-5. Was Chris wrong a few years ago?

32.title: Resident Evil? Diesel Power in a Porsche Panamera

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

32.plot: The world thinks the Panamera is ugly, and that no Porsche should be powered by a diesel engine. So the Panamera diesel makes people froth with anger - mainly because they think it isn't fast enough. Chris investigates.

33.title: AMG CLS 63 Shooting Brake. Niche Car Porn

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

33.plot: Can you have too many new AMGs? No, you can't. This estate-like, low-roofer probably answers a question no one has yet asked. But it goes like a randy rabbit and looks superb.

34.title: Flat Out in a Le Mans Winning Porsche 962

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

34.plot: This car belongs to the Porsche Museum. It is worth millions of dollars. And they let me spank it at their Weissach test track. Good times.

35.title: Porsche 918 Spyder: A Ride in Porsche's Hybrid Hypercar

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

35.plot: Porsche was testing the 918 at the Nurburgring, they invited us to take a quick ride on the road, not on the track sadly. I normally hate these shotgun features, unless they involve Group B cars, but the 918 needs some understanding.

36.title: Retro Cool: Spa 6hrs in a Ford Falcon

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

36.plot: It looks like a Cuban taxi, but it weighs 1250kg and has over 400hp. It's a great way to take part in one of the world's great races.

37.title: BMW M135i v Audi RS3: Road, Track, Drag-race

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

37.plot: BMW's M135i undercuts the RS3 by £10k in base spec, it's only 20hp down and weighs 150kg less. Can a sub M-car beat Audi's premium fast car representation?

38.title: McLaren MP4-12C Spider First Drive

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

38.plot: A quick blast around the Ascari Race Resort in the new drop-top McLaren. Carbon tub should mean it loses very little over the Coupe. Latest engine spec gives 625hp.

39.title: Track Test: Nissan DeltaWing Driven at Road Atlanta

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

39.plot: Surely the most interesting and innovative racing car of the past 30 years, the DeltaWing finished 5th at Petit Le Mans. We drove it two days after the race. Engineer Ben Bowlby's interview is compulsory viewing for all racing fans. A day to remember.

40.title: 200mph Drag Race: Porsche GT2 RS v. Ducati 1199 Panigale

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

40.plot: Last time, on the drag strip, the Porsche was destroyed. This time we went to a 2 mile runway to see what happens when you let a GT2 RS stretch beyond 150mph. No bikers were hurt in the making of this film.

41.title: Ford Focus ST Hot Hatchback Showdown

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

41.plot: This is the long-awaited showdown between the new Ford Focus ST and Europe's other latest hot hatches, the Renaultsport Megane RS and Vauxhall Astra VXR. On road and on track.

42.title: Mercedes SLS GT AMG: Hockenheim Track Test

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

42.plot: Not the obvious choice in the 458 marketplace, but a special car all the same, the SLS now gets an extra 20hp (like it needed any more power) and a sharper chassis. Small beer, but we had not done a video on an SLS in 2012, and they're just so cool, so we went to Hockenheim.

43.title: The Singer 911: All You Ever Wanted to Know

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

43.plot: To some people, mainly Porsche people, this is the most desirable car you could own. Its creators are a bunch of zany, brilliant Porsche-files who have invested their lives in re-imagining the classic Porsche 911 shape for the year 2013. We tour the factory, speak to the team and drive it on road and track.

44.title: Snowdrift: Volvo S60 Polestar (with a Bit of C63 AMG). And a Drag Race.

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

44.plot: They drive a car from Sweden to the UK to avoid the snow. And it snows in the UK. We got to play in it though, and that cool air probably made it good for at least 508hp. It's a small-volume concept for now, but we had a C63 on display to add some perspective (actually, just because it was hilarious in the snow)

45.title: Ferrari 458 Spider Nailed

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

45.plot: Don't ask how I came to be driving it. I'm a year late to this review, so most people already know what they need to know. But do they know what the Spider is like if you drive it like a mentalist? They will now.

46.title: BMW M6 v Mercedes SL63 AMG

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

46.plot: With over 1100hp combined these are the ultimate super-heated GT cars. Fast enough to match a 911 Turbo, comfy enough to cruise a continent.

47.title: Ice Driving in 911 Rally Cars

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

47.plot: Ask me what I'd do with my last gallon of fuel and this is it- go skid around on a frozen lake for a day. The best fun you can have in a car.

48.title: 2013 Porsche Cayman S Thrashed

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

48.plot: Chris Harris reviews the new 2013 Porsche Cayman S in Portugal.

49.title: The Wye Dean Rally in a Ratty BMW 325i

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

49.plot: The car cost £4k, Dan had never read notes before, and it's known to be a very attritional event. Into the near pit we went....

50.title: Geneva Show Report: McLaren P1, LaFerrari, and E63 Road Test

episode of.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (TV Series 2012– )

50.plot: Motor show reports can be a bit dull, but not if there are new McLaren and Ferrari hyper-cars, a new GT3 and an Alfa sports car. But even so, we added an E63 road test because, well, we always like some action.

imdb.title: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars
akas: Drive: Chris Harris on Cars (United States)
plot: Automotive journalist and skilled driver Chris Harris hosts in depth reviews and news for all things automotive.::Anonymous
